snippet: A close associate of the president resigned after photographs showed him using a government helicopter for family purposes, the most recent in a series of missteps by officials.
abstract: Mexican National Water Commission chief David Korenfeld resigns amid scandal over misuse of official helicopter.
lead_paragraph: A close associate of the president resigned after photographs showed him using a government helicopter for family purposes, the most recent in a series of missteps by officials.

headline.main: Mexican Official Quits Over Helicopter Ride
headline.print_headline: Mexican Official Quits Over Helicopter Ride
